item.title: Is Outsourcing Killing Developers
item.description: I live and work in one of the Balkan countries, Belgrade, Serbia. After the sad ’90s, all countries in the region try to catch up with the rest of the world. That led to a boom in IT. A large portion of IT is outsourcing companies. Some companies are domestic, and some are foreign. Also, some companies opened their R&D centers in the region. Small and big as well. There was and still is a large number of startups.
